data.Title: Google Search Console Link Report Fixed
data.Description: The Google Search Console link report now seems to be fixed. As reported last week, a decline in links being reported by the tool was observed, followed by a huge decline a few days later. The tool now seems to be showing the previous link count before the bug.

data.Title: Google to Stop Indexing Sites That Don't Work on Mobile Devices
data.Description: Google has announced that it will soon crawl all sites for Search with the Googlebot Smartphone crawler. This means that if a site's content is not accessible on mobile devices, it will no longer be indexed by Google. The change will take effect after July 5, 2024.

data.Title: How to Get Your Pages into Google AI Overviews
data.Description: A bunch of SEOs are now experimenting with how they can show up in the Google AI Overviews, not just remove themselves from AI Overviews. Cyrus Shepard posted a "mini case study" on X, showing how he was able to work his site into the AI Overviews.

data.Title: Google Search Experienced Volatility on June 1st
data.Description: Google Search has been experiencing volatility over the past several weeks, with significant movement observed on June 1st. The volatility has been noted by various SEO tracking tools and has been a topic of discussion within the SEO community.

data.Title: Instagram Testing Unskippable Ads
data.Description: Instagram is testing a new ad format that is unskippable and features a countdown timer. This new format temporarily prevents users from scrolling through their feeds.

data.Title: Spotify to Increase Premium Pricing in the US
data.Description: Spotify is raising the price of its premium subscription service in the US to $11.99 per month. This price increase is expected to generate an additional $1.4 billion in revenue per year for the company.

data.Title: Businesses Increasingly Seeking SEO Services
data.Description: There has been an 84% increase in businesses searching for SEO services. This indicates a growing awareness of the importance of SEO for online visibility and business growth.
